description: Eiru is an innovative startup that measures biodiversity in agricultural fields using advanced technology, including microphones and artificial intelligence. Founded after winning the Invap prize for innovation, Eiru aims to enhance food production by promoting sustainable practices. Their approach offers a faster, more efficient alternative to traditional biodiversity measurement methods, addressing the urgent global decline in biodiversity. The company seeks to connect with producers to improve agricultural practices while ensuring environmental sustainability.
name: Eiru Tech
